detail.description: Globus Spirits Limited, established in 1992 is primarily engaged in the business of manufacture and sale of Indian Made Indian Liquor (IMIL), Indian Made Foreign Liquor (IMFL), Bulk Alcohol hand sanitizer, and Franchise Bottling. It has a unique 360⁰ model straddling across the entire alcohol value chain. It is the 1st to set up a grain distillery and launch branded DDGS in India. [1] [2] [3]
